Salaries of News Men
Although every significant survey dealing in program
preferences and interests has always placed the field
of news as one of the most important programs to the
listener, only a minority of educational stations include
news men in their salary budgets. In most instances
it appears that students fill this important position.
Administrators may want to re-examine their thinking
along these lines if news programs on educational stations
are to be of higher caliber.
Salary Range
1. Colleges and Universities
10 watts
2. Colleges and Universities $3,601.00 $3,120.00-5,000.00
